sentences: Thomas Herier, Erier, Erriers, or Erars (fl. 1240–1270) was a Picard trouvère associated with the "Arras school".
His poems are heptasyllabic with the exception of the decasyllabic Mais n'os chanter and generally isometric.
Karp considers Bien me sui aperceus and Ja ne lairai mon usage to be more ornate than the others.
